taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013
IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits inshore waters and feeds on zooplankton (Ref. 267).  Mouthbrooder (Ref. 94785).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Lake Malawi (Karonga to Monkey Bay)(Ref. 4979) and Lake Malombe (Ref. 94785) in Malawi.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 8.0 - 8.5; dH range: 10 - 15

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#LifeCycle
dataObjects.description: Spawns in the water column and does not build bowers (Ref. 42940). Females carries fry in mouth.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Conservation
dataObjects.title: IUCN Red List Assessment

Red List Category

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2006

Assessor/s
Kazembe, J., Makocho, P. & Mailosi, A.

Reviewer/s
Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)

Contributor/s

Justification
Endemic to Lakes Malawi and Malombe where it is widespread with no major widespread threats identified.
